image.caption: 2. Locate and tap the General icon, located in the third group from the top.
3. Scroll to the bottom, then locate the fourth group up from the bottom. Tap the third item of that group (Language & Region).
4. Tap the first setting in the list (iPhone Language).
Enter your language in the search field. Then, tap your language in the list.
6. Tap the button at the top right (Done).
7. Tap the first item in the window, Change to English (United States).
